lang.directions: Click on a red hotspot in the schematic or on an item in the Equipment menu to see corresponding lubricant information. To view more of the schematic, click and drag with your mouse or use the arrow keys on your keyboard.
lang.touchModeQuestion: It appears you’re using a touch-enabled device. Would you prefer to use the touch-optimized interface?

schematic.name: Gas And Steam Turbine Power Plant

products.name: Mobil SHC™ 600
products.information: Synthetic gear, bearing and circulating oils
products.benefits: Helps improve equipment productivity due to reduced unscheduled downtime and maintenance; long gear and bearing life under high-stress operating conditions; helps extend oil life; helps improve energy efficiency compared with mineral oils

products.name: Mobil SHC™ 600
products.information: Synthetic gear, bearing and circulating oils
products.benefits: Helps improve equipment productivity due to reduced unscheduled downtime and maintenance; long gear and bearing life under high-stress operating conditions; helps extend oil life; helps improve energy efficiency compared with mineral oils

products.name: Mobil DTE™ 700
products.information: Turbine oils for steam and moderate duty gas turbines in non-geared applications
products.benefits: Single product for wide range of turbine applications; simplifies inventory and product application; helps resist thermal degradation and minimize system deposits thermal degradation and helps minimize system deposits

products.name: Mobil DTE™ 700
products.information: Turbine oils for steam and moderate duty gas turbines in non-geared applications
products.benefits: Single product for wide range of turbine applications; simplifies inventory and product application; helps resist thermal degradation and minimize system deposits thermal degradation and helps minimize system deposits

products.name: Mobil Polyrex™ EM
products.information: Electric motor bearing grease
products.benefits: Advanced thickener formulation for improved bearing performance and protection for long electric motor life; excellent corrosion resistance; low-noise properties

products.name: Mobil DTE™ Oil Named
products.information: Premium circulating oils
products.benefits: The highly versatile performance of Mobil DTE™ Oil Named lubricants has made them the oil of choice for a multitude of industrial equipment applications around the world

products.name: Mobilith SHC™
products.information: Synthetic greases for lubrication of bearings
products.benefits: Excellent wear protection of components; easy start-up at low temperature; excellent thermal stability and oxidation resistance; helps maximize re-greasing interval when compared to conventional oils, which can potentially reduce service costs

products.name: Mobil SHC™ 600
products.information: Synthetic gear, bearing and circulating oils
products.benefits: Helps improve equipment productivity due to reduced unscheduled downtime and maintenance; long gear and bearing life under high-stress operating conditions; helps extend oil life; helps improve energy efficiency compared with mineral oils

products.name: Mobil Polyrex™ EM
products.information: Electric motor bearing grease
products.benefits: Advanced thickener formulation for improved bearing performance and protection for long electric motor life; excellent corrosion resistance; low-noise properties

products.name: Mobil Rarus SHC™ 1020
products.information: Synthetic rotary screw compressor oils
products.benefits: Helps to: extend service life; helps reduce deposits; helps provide long oil life; helps lower maintenance costs; helps reduce wear of components

products.name: Mobil Rarus™ 800
products.information: Synthetic compressor oils
products.benefits: Suitable for reciprocating and rotary screw compressor with the lower viscosity grade used in rotary screw compressors; higher viscosity grades used in reciprocating compressors help reduce deposits on valves in these compressors, reducing potential for fires and explosions compared to mineral oil products

products.name: Mobil Delvac™ 1300 Super
products.information: Extra high performance diesel engine oils that help extend engine life in some of the most severe on and off-highway applications while delivering outstanding performance in modern, high-output, low-emission engines, including those with Exhaust Gas Recirculation (EGR) and after-treatment Systems with Diesel Particulate Filters (DPFs) and Diesel Oxidation Catalysts (DOCs)
products.benefits: Greater engine efficiency when compared to conventional lubricants; helps reduce low temperature sludge build up and high temperature deposits; helps lower oil costs due to less make-up oil during operation; excellent low temperature pumpability; long life of critical wear surfaces

products.name: Mobil Delvac™ 1600
products.information: High performance monograde diesel engine oils formulated from advanced technology base oils and a balanced additive system; specifically engineered for performance in intercooled, turbo-charged engines operating under severe on and off-highway conditions
products.benefits: Helps to protect against oil thickening, high temperature deposits, sludge build-up, oil degradation and corrosion; long-term deposit/wear control; helps control formation of acids when using higher sulfur fuels

products.name: Mobil DTE™ 700
products.information: Turbine oils for steam and moderate duty gas turbines in non-geared applications
products.benefits: Single product for wide range of turbine applications; simplifies inventory and product application; helps resist thermal degradation and minimize system deposits thermal degradation and helps minimize system deposits

products.information: Turbine oils for severe-duty steam, gas, and combined-cycle gas turbines
products.benefits: Long oil life; helps improve deposit control; can help lower maintenance costs

products.information: Synthetic turbine oils for stationary gas turbines
products.benefits: Excellent low-temperature and viscosity/temperature properties; excellent oxidation stability; outstanding protection against wear
